name: Lifted
slogan: Building the future of care at home
description:
Lifted is a tech-led care company on a mission to revolutionise home care. We combine industry leading tech with a deeply personal origin to tackle the generational issue of the care crisis. Lifted was inspired by our Co-founder (ex-McKinsey and Cabinet Office) and CEO’s frustrating experience looking for care for her mum after she was diagnosed with dementia aged 56.    

Lifted entered the market in March 19 and we have grown rapidly. We are growing 20% month on month delivering >600 care hours per week.  We have earned exclusively 5* TrustPilot reviews secured a glowing report from the Care Quality Commission and were selected as one of the top 21 startups most likely to transform the NHS in London. Clients and Carers love our Platform with 90% using it daily. 

We are closing our VC round and we are so excited to grow our team. We are a diverse group of 50 people united by our passion for improving care. We love what we do, and we'd love you to join us.
